custom-sql.sql: SELECT DISTINCT {AssetEntrySet.*} FROM AssetEntrySet INNER JOIN AssetSharingEntry ON (AssetSharingEntry.classPK = AssetEntrySet.assetEntrySetId) WHERE ( (AssetEntrySet.createTime [$CREATE_TIME_COMPARATOR$] ?) AND (AssetEntrySet.parentAssetEntrySetId = ?) ) AND (AssetSharingEntry.classNameId = ?) AND ([$SHARED_TO$]) ORDER BY AssetEntrySet.createTime DESC
